name: hover-api-esm
description: Hover DNS API Client JS ESM

scripts.publish-npm: npm login --registry=https://registry.npmjs.org && npm publish && npm logout
scripts.publish-github: cp ./publish/.npmrc ./ && npm login --registry=https://npm.pkg.github.com && npm publish && npm logout && rm ./.npmrc
scripts.publish-all: npm run publish-npm && npm run publish-github

author: Paul Searcy <tridon777@gmail.com>
